summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 28, 2019. It includes count sheets, out-count forms, and inmate rosters detailing the population and assignments for that day. The most significant entry is the explicit listing of inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the attorney visit roster, placing him at the MCC on that date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed by name and register number (76318-054) on an inmate roster under the 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment category, with a housing unit of H01-001L and status as 'UNASSG'.

events.title: Daily Prison Count and Administration
events.description: Routine administrative procedures at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, including inmate counts, out-counts for inmates away from their units, and roster updates for assignments like hospital and attorney visits.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY (MCC New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 28, 2019, with register number 76318-054.
Epstein is listed on an 'INMATE ROSTER' under the 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment category, indicating he had or was scheduled for a legal visit that day.
His listed housing unit was H01-001L and his work assignment status was 'UNASSG' (unassigned).
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms (Count Sheets, Out-Count Forms, Inmate Rosters) showing the routine population management of the facility.
The time of the main count recorded was 10:00 AM on July 28, 2019.
